remarks: Converse of ~ 19.33 given ` -. ( E. x ph /\ E. x ps ) ` and a decidability condition.  Compare Theorem 19.33 of [Margaris] p. 90.  For a version which does not require a decidability condition, see ~ 19.33b2 (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 23-Apr-2018.)
statement: 19.33bdc $p |- ( DECID E. x ph -> ( -. ( E. x ph /\ E. x ps ) -> ( A. x ( ph \/ ps ) <-> ( A. x ph \/ A. x ps ) ) ) ) $.
